me welawe kopawu waidyawaraya kanthawata bana boru kiw nisa beheth damimata hawasa hathara wenakal sitina lesata thunduwak liya di atha.
"aa, male harima sok wade me ingiris panthiya..
hadu wedisara ekathu karagena.......
wi balimata puluwana.
api hamogema jiwitha kathawa oba wachana walata galapima harima apurayi...
muslim aagame ohuwa eesa namin hadunwanne yonaka deshaya samaga eda thibunu bauddha sambandakam nisaya.
diwayina pura ahasa walakulin barawa pawathinu athayi balaporoththu wana athara diwayina haraha saha diwayina awata muhudu pradeshawala tharamak thada sulan da apeksha kala haka.
mahima/anith eka: ee wunata ban ee hadena katha jiwitha kaletama ehema thamayi.
ampare wada wasana kalaye ampara disthrikkaye janathawa unwahanse handunagena sitiye ampare hamuruwan namini.
gangaka, wawaka, alaka dolaka bahala athi wenna nanna oonalu.
ee athara garbhanibawata abhimanayak nowa awamanayak gena aa haki andum da athi bawa ma menma oba da daka athi bawa sthiraya.
mama aadare oyata.
balalath hure kiyala duwanawa.
pahala athi pinthuraye aththe apayata yana maha margaya aththe ethana bawayi.
gini awi saha ginikeli chithrapataya teli natyayak widiyata nirmanaya karanawa.
thamage daskamak lesa neapenwayi.

ehi henri jayasenayan wishishta lesa charithayata awathirna wi thibu athara, hadaya aadayam wartha thabamin thiragatha wimen henri jayasena janapriya menma prabuddha sinama ranga wediyakage thathwayata path wiya.
apa wisin ema pujawa prathikshepa karanu labuwahoth dewiyan wahanse ha samagi wime pujawak apata thawath nolabiya haka.
yana gaman sankhapala wiharaya wagema ambailipitiya haraha noya..ambailipitiyata kilo mitar 13k withara mehayin uda walawa handiyen wamata dala waw bamma udin pare yanawanan hodayi...
mahacharya ganganathge premayata wishwa widyalaya waseyi
oben kotasak wishwawidyalayatayi.
ada inna ya me ayage ahalakin wath thiyanna baha
eya sadharaniyakaranaya karanu labuwe deshiya kiri gowithana nanwalime namayeni.

hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha samaye nayijiriyanu thanapathi dhuraya daru idakadam wyaparika ee es pi liyanage mahatha nawa rajaya yatathe katar deshaye shri lanka thanapathi lesa eeye pathwim lipiya laba gaththa.
rakawaranaya saha nadaththu kirima
chayawak watini wisirunu adura matha
ee lamaya panthiyata aawe intawal eke" sar kiwwe api nodana hitiya deyak.
me lipiya da ee wenuweni.
nathnam mata as ledada..
insiyulin adunam behethwalin insiyulin hadanawa.
me sadaha ayadum kalahakke :
ado mage patikka liyanna enna kiwwata enne na ban..moko karanne?
eya hithanawa oyata oyage paduwe inna arina ekayi hondama de kiyala.
ethakota athula ekka wiwaha wenna oba thiranaya kale ayi?
daruwange anagathe wenuwen koyi tharam nam dewal karanna thiyenawada.
sha්ri lankawe china thanapathi karyalaya ha ekwa
me kumanthranaya budunge kalaye patan ena ekak da?
eeth samahara awastha waladi nam karadare watuna..
ape ayiyalage wada ohomaya - mehemaya.

lankawe bahutharayak minissunta chithrapata rasawidima sambandhayen thiyenne hungak katha purudu tikak.kohe ho rataka horata gahapu adu kolitiyaka chithrapata balanna ape aya purudu wela inne anna ee nisayi.samahara wita pakisthanaye wage rataka idala lankawata ena me hora di.wi.di wala saha torant wage sayit walin bhagatha karaganna chithrapata wala thiyenne harima anthargathayada kiyalath sakayak thiyenawa.aasiyathika ratawala inna api mehema chithrapata saha rupawahini wadasatahan balana eke lokuma awulak thamayi ema chithrapataya nirmanaya karapu parshawayanta satha pahaka aadayamak nolabi yama.
dan krikat, futbol, ragbi okkoma kelloth gahanawa...
ee enakam hitha hadagena balagena inna..."

aasiyathika sthriya daruwan wenuwen thama ayithin thaman wihinma pagagena indima iwasanna bari thana liyawune pokuru....api samahara welawal walata oonawatath wada sanwedi wenawa....eeth wadak wenne nathi eka gana hari wedanayi...!
mewani awasthawala daruwan manasikawa binda watila prathikarawalata pawa yomuwena awastha thiyenawa.
paswani kotasa padaka wela thibune podi ewun dennek athaharala dapu manasika prathikara karana niwasayakata gihin ehe hitiya mole …
mama kale thun wana shreniye indala ingirisi poth tika thaniyen igana ganna patan ganimayi.
thawa widiyakin kiwwoth shakthiya prayojanayata gaththe jiwath wimata pamanayi.
“upakalpana me wargaye ninditha ha boru.
shiranthi rajapaksha janadhipathi apekshakathwayata idiripath kirima udesa wu yojanawa thanikarama idiripath wanne mahinda rajapakshata namal rajapaksha kerehi athi premaya nisaweni.

janadhipathi birinda lesath in anathuruwath muhuna pa athdakim mishel obama mahathmiya mema granthayata athulath kara athi athara emagin wathman janadhipathi donald tramp mahatha dadi wiwechchanayakata lak kara thikhenawa.
daiwaya wisin mawa deshapalanayata genawa.
me lipiya katina pinkam nimawa sitina awasthawe wuwada ee pilibandawa sitha yomu karawannaki.
sathiyakata eka dinaka iganwimata (paya 2-3) rupiyal. 1000/= (kolambaa awata )

blu mawuntan kusalana thunkon krikat tharagawaliye siwwani tharagaya wana shri lankawa saha simbabwe kandayam athara bulawayohidi ada (21 wanida) pawathi tharagaya warshawa hethuwen atharamaga nathara kiri...
anika blog eka danna giyama padath na.
eya kiyapu eka aththa.
mathu dakwena paridi, eya dharmika palanaya nisa ahase eyata himi thana kara nagi gos, rajyaye dharmika bawa gana waga kiyamin ehi aarakshakaya lesa ki්raya karayi.
anna ee wage thamayi ape […]
shantha madhyakaruwaku wuye tharamak mathadi ya.
yam kandayamak me githaya gayana kirimen mahajana kalambaim athiwe yayi polisiyata paminili kalahoth siduwanne kumakda?
chithrapatiyen 1/3 k pamana rugatha kala.
api balamu kokatath…
ayawa apahasuthawayata pathweddi thamange kenek laga naha kiyana aduwa me kisima kenek ayata danenna ida harinne naha.
bima wadiwenta, anna hari.
meka ayiyage kathawata kohethma adala nathi wunath mata mathak wunu nisa liwwe.
eeth ekkama pahugiya kalaye rate athiwu thaththwaya thula wipakshaye samagiyak athiwanne nam aanduwata muhuna diya haki wathawaranayak godanagena bawatath samajaye kathabaha athi wuna.
wisheshayen ma minissun ge shariraye ihalin ma pihitala thiyena kotasa...
meya pasugiyada rogiyekuta baddha kala athara eya lowa pa්rathama sinthatik awayawa baddhaya wuna.
meya chithranaya kirimedi api sankalpayen kipayak pilibandawa athhada baluwa.
nepalaye welawen ada (mayi 13) udasana thama sahodariya ewarast kandumudunata langa wu bawa ayage sahodarayaku wisin sahathika karanu labuni.
aadayam labima athin yahapathya.
